verses.verse: Let <WG5293> every<WG3956> soul<WG5590> be in subjection to<WG5293> the higher<WG5242> powers<WG1849>: for<WG1063> there is<WG2076> no<WG3756> power1849, 1487 but<WG3361> of<WG575> God<WG2316>; and the powers<WG1849> that be<WG5607> are<WG1526> ordained<WG5021> of<WG5259> God<WG2316>.

Therefore <WG5620> he that resisteth<WG498> the power<WG1849>, withstandeth<WG436> the ordinance<WG1296> of God<WG2316>: and<WG1161> they that withstand<WG436> shall receive<WG2983> to themselves<WG1438> judgment<WG2917>.

For <WG1063> rulers<WG758> are<WG1526> not<WG3756> a terror<WG5401> to<WG2041> the good<WG18> work<WG2041>, but<WG235> to<WG2041> the evil<WG2556>. And wouldest thou<WG2309> have no<WG3361> fear of<WG5399> the power<WG1849>? do<WG4160> that which is good<WG18>, and<WG2532> thou shalt have<WG2192> praise<WG1868> from<WG1537> the same<WG846>:

for <WG1063> he is<WG2076> a minister<WG1249> of God<WG2316> to thee<WG4671> for<WG1519> good<WG18>. But<WG1161> if<WG1437> thou do<WG4160> that which is evil<WG2556>, be afraid<WG5399>; for<WG1063> he beareth<WG5409> not<WG3756> the sword<WG3162> in vain<WG1500>: for<WG1063> he is<WG2076> a minister<WG1249> of God<WG2316>, an avenger<WG1558> for wrath<WG3709> to<WG1519> him that doeth<WG4238> evil<WG2556>.
Wherefore <WG1352> ye must needs<WG318> be in subjection<WG5293>, not<WG3756> only<WG3440> because<WG1223> of the wrath<WG3709>, but<WG235> also<WG2532> for<WG1223> conscience<WG4893>' sake.

<WG1063> For<WG1223> this cause<WG5124> ye<WG5055> pay tribute<WG5411> also<WG2532>; for<WG1063> they are<WG1526> ministers<WG3011> of God<WG2316>'s service<WG4342>, attending continually upon<WG1519> this<WG5124> very thing<WG846>.

Render591, 3767 to all<WG3956> their dues<WG3782>: tribute<WG5411> to whom<WG3588> tribute<WG5411> is due<WG5056>; custom to whom<WG3588> custom<WG5056>; fear<WG5401> to whom<WG3588> fear<WG5401>; honor<WG5092> to whom<WG3588> honor<WG5092>.
Owe <WG3784> no man<WG3367> anything<WG1487>, save<WG3361> to love<WG25> one another<WG240>: for<WG1063> he that loveth<WG25> his neighbor<WG2087> hath fulfilled<WG4137> the law<WG3551>.

For <WG1063> this<WG3588>, Thou shalt<WG3431> not<WG3756> commit adultery<WG3431>, Thou shalt<WG5407> not<WG3756> kill<WG5407>, Thou shalt<WG2813> not<WG3756> steal<WG2813>, Thou shalt<WG5576> not<WG3756> covet<WG1937>, and<WG2532> if<WG1487> there be any<WG5100> other<WG2087> commandment<WG1785>, it is summed<WG346> up in<WG1722> this<WG5129> word<WG3056>, namely<WG1722>, Thou shalt love<WG25> thy<WG4675> neighbor<WG4139> as<WG5613> thyself<WG1438>.
Love <WG26> worketh<WG2038> no<WG3756> ill<WG2556> to his neighbor<WG4139>: love<WG26> therefore<WG3767> is the fulfilment<WG4138> of the law<WG3551>.

And <WG2532> this<WG5124>, knowing<WG1492> the season<WG5610>, that<WG3754> already<WG2235> it is time<WG2540> for you<WG2248> to awake<WG1453> out of<WG1537> sleep<WG5258>: for<WG1063> now<WG3568> is<WG2257> salvation<WG4991> nearer<WG1452> to us than<WG2228> when<WG3753> we first believed<WG4100>.

The night<WG3571> is far spent<WG1161>, and the day<WG2250> is at hand<WG1448>: let us<WG659> therefore<WG3767> cast off<WG659> the works<WG2041> of darkness<WG4655>, and<WG2532> let us put on<WG1746> the armor<WG3696> of light<WG5457>.

Let us walk<WG4043> becomingly<WG2156>, as<WG5613> in<WG1722> the day<WG2250>; not<WG3361> in revelling<WG2970> and<WG2532> drunkenness<WG3178>, not<WG3361> in chambering<WG2845> and<WG2532> wantonness<WG766>, not<WG3361> in strife<WG2054> and<WG2532> jealousy<WG2205>.
But <WG235> put ye on<WG1746> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> make<WG4160> not<WG3361> provision<WG4307> for the flesh<WG4561>, to<WG1519> fulfil the lusts thereof<WG1939>.
